name: New Orleans Coffee
description: New Orleans Coffee is known for its rich flavor and smooth texture, typically enjoyed with chicory.
roast_description: Light roasts have a mild flavor and higher acidity, preserving the distinct characteristics of the beans.

name: French Coffee
description: French Coffee is characterized by its bold and intense flavor, often with notes of dark chocolate.
roast_description: Dark roasts have a robust, full-bodied flavor with a hint of bitterness, ideal for those who enjoy strong coffee.

name: Brazil Coffee
description: Brazil Coffee offers a balanced flavor with a combination of nutty and chocolatey notes, suitable for any time of the day.
roast_description: Medium roasts have a well-rounded flavor profile with balanced acidity and body, making them versatile and popular.

name: Moroccan Coffee
description: Moroccan Coffee is rich and aromatic, often enjoyed with spices like cinnamon and cardamom.
roast_description: Dark roasts have a robust, full-bodied flavor with a hint of bitterness, ideal for those who enjoy strong coffee.

name: Arabic Coffee
description: Arabic Coffee is known for its unique preparation method and rich, spicy flavor profile.
roast_description: Dark roasts have a robust, full-bodied flavor with a hint of bitterness, ideal for those who enjoy strong coffee.

name: Colombian Coffee
description: Colombian Coffee is celebrated for its smooth and well-balanced flavor, often with hints of caramel and nuts.
roast_description: Dark roasts have a robust, full-bodied flavor with a hint of bitterness, ideal for those who enjoy strong coffee.

name: Kenya Coffee
description: Kenya Coffee is renowned for its bright acidity and fruity notes, offering a vibrant and complex flavor.

name: Italian Coffee
description: Italian Coffee is famous for its deep, rich flavor and is often used in espresso blends.

name: American Coffee
description: American Coffee typically has a balanced and smooth flavor, making it a popular choice for daily consumption.

name: Viennese Coffee
description: Viennese Coffee is known for its smooth, creamy texture and slightly sweet flavor, often enjoyed with whipped cream.
